note: This file defines all future enhancements that are intentionally excluded from the v1.x roadmap to preserve core stability. These items are planned for v2.0+ and experimental releases.

enhancements.title: Data Adapters Integration (v2.0)
enhancements.description: Integrate maatify/data-adapters as a bridge layer to enable unified Redis, MongoDB, and MySQL connections with support for fake adapters in testing environments.
goals: Enable FakeAdapters for deterministic stress testing
Allow environment-based adapter switching (prod vs testing)
Unify connection pooling and lifecycle management
risks: Performance regression if not carefully isolated

enhancements.title: User Behavioral AI
enhancements.description: Analyze user behavior patterns to detect anomalies and predict abusive traffic before rate limits are exceeded.
goals: Flag suspicious clients for pre-emptive throttling

enhancements.title: Adaptive Rate Limits
enhancements.description: Dynamically adjust rate limits based on user trust score, account age, role, and risk profile.

enhancements.title: Distributed Sync (Multi-Node)
enhancements.description: Synchronize Redis rate counters across multiple servers using Pub/Sub or Streams for horizontally scaled systems.

enhancements.title: Custom Policies
enhancements.description: Allow custom per-route, per-method, and per-role rate limiting configurations.
